```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
codes <- read_csv("data/raw/p1_heatmap_input.csv")
```

```{r create codes columns}
# Multi-coding in single cell
codes_long <- codes |> 
    separate_rows(
        leadership_model,
        objective,
        equity_frame,
        risk_cues,
        placement_domain,
        implications_for_accel,
        sep = ","
    )
```
